# Issue #1: Complete Shopify Theme Header and Footer Sections

**Type:** `feat(theme)`
**Label:** `enhancement`, `theme`
**Project:** Custom Shopify Theme

## Description
Create fully functional header and footer sections for the custom Shopify theme with navigation, branding, and essential links.

## Requirements

### Header Section
- [ ] Logo display with configurable size
- [ ] Main navigation menu (desktop)
- [ ] Mobile hamburger menu
- [ ] Search functionality
- [ ] Cart icon with item count
- [ ] Account/login link
- [ ] Sticky header option (configurable)
- [ ] Announcement bar

### Footer Section
- [ ] Multi-column layout
- [ ] Newsletter signup form
- [ ] Social media links
- [ ] Payment icons
- [ ] Copyright information
- [ ] Secondary navigation links
- [ ] Contact information block

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Header is responsive on all devices
- [ ] Navigation works on mobile and desktop
- [ ] Footer displays correctly on all pages
- [ ] All links are functional
- [ ] Theme settings allow customization
- [ ] Follows accessibility standards

## Files to Create/Modify
- `sections/header.liquid`
- `sections/footer.liquid`
- `snippets/header-menu.liquid`
- `snippets/social-links.liquid`
- `assets/header.css`
- `assets/footer.css`

## References
- Shopify Theme Architecture: https://shopify.dev/themes/architecture
- Sections documentation: https://shopify.dev/themes/architecture/sections
